definition: YUKAWA Hideki (1907-1988), Japanese theoretical physicist and Nobel laureate
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
abbr. for Sichuan Province 四川[Si4 chuan1] in southwest China
